price: For if You leave them, they will surely lead Your slaves astray and beget none but wicked disbelievers.
arabic: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرۡهُمۡ يُضِلُّواْ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓاْ إِلَّا فَاجِرٗا كَفَّارٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
